headline: Is Eversource Energy (ES) the Best Utility Stock to Buy According to Hedge Funds?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 12 Best Utility Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) stands against the other utility stocks. headline: Algonquin Power Completes Sale of Its Renewable Energy Business
summary: AQN completes the sale of its renewable energy business. This should help AQN turn into a pure-play regulated utility with reduced complexity.
